attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Woolworths have today gone into administration, 30,000 people could and most likely will loose there jobs. Can the government not assist this company and its employees?  30,000 people unemployed overnight with no help from the government is unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
